description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Frequently updated, "Twin Stick Shooter RPG" that you don't have to play solo. Features 8 Player PvP  and 4 Player PvE with drop in multiplayer. Music by Purple-Planet.com. Patch 2.0: Bug fixes, 3 new world 6 armor sets and weapons.
description.short: Frequently updated, "Twin Stick Shooter RPG" that you don't have to play solo. Features 8 Player PvP  and 4 Player PvE with drop in multiplayer. Music by Purple-Planet.com. Patch 2.0: Bug fixes, 3 new world 6 armor sets and weapons.
